sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' function AboutSevices() { return ( <> {/* Services start */}

Explore Our Services

Hiring For Java Developer ||
Senior Software Engineer

• Knowledge of object-oriented design and design patterns, and programming skills.
• Knowledge of and experience with Frontend technologies is also desirable.
• Strong concepts of clean code principles.

Apply Now

Video Editing Intern

• Assembling raw footage and transferring or uploading it to a computer.
• Following a script, screenplay, or outline.
• Inputting sound to enhance footage, which may include selecting music and writing voice-overs.
• Inputting graphics to enhance footage.

Apply Now

Graphic Designer
SENSE STRATEGY & DESIGN

• The ideal candidate will have strong creative skills and a portfolio of work which demonstrates their passion for illustrative design and typography.
• This candidate will have experiences in working with numerous different design platforms such as digital and print forms.

Apply Now

Customer Care Executive

• Customer Support for telecom, retail and banking, insurance segment.
• Maintain the reports accurate.
Involved in Providing Email and chat Customer support to External End Users and External Commercial Account End Users 4G network support across India. Handling emails / chats resolving technical and customer service issues for telecom process.
• Proficient in Connectivity telecom issues and customer service.
• Proficient in Understanding of Customer product and support.

Apply Now

English Teacher - Teaching

• Must be best in Spoken English.
• The Teacher will be responsible for the day to day class room activity for the schools.
• Understanding the curriculum and implementing it in the class.
• Identifying the needs and interests of the children.
• Should have ability to teach senior grades

Apply Now

Internship Coursework Program - Machine Learning And Data Science

• Basics of Mathematics - Linear Algebra, Probability, Differential Equation.
• Fundamentals of Python Programming Language
Fundamentals of Statistics & Industry-related projects.
• Industry-related Machine Learning Projects and Machine Learning Algorithms - Linear & Multiple Regression, PCA.
• Fundamental of Neural networks & Deep Learning.
• Industry relevant projects, fundamental programming assignments, and attending mentorship classes of our Scientists.
• Interview Questions & Discussions

Apply Now
{/* Services end */} ) } export default AboutSevices
